tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ComplianceMonitoring (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    regulation_code VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    compliance_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE,
  regulatory_body VARCHAR(50),
  status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_checks (
  check_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  check_date DATE,
  regulation_id INT,
  check_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE industry_standards (
  standard_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  standard_name VARCHAR(50),
  applicable_regulation VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE regulators_regulations (
    regulator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    regulator_name VARCHAR(255),
    regulation_name VARCHAR(255),
    regulation_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE companies (
    company_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(255),
    industry_sector VARCHAR(255),
    headquarters_location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    compliance_status VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES companies(company_id)
)

CREATE TABLE regulations_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    regulation_name VARCHAR(255),
    enactment_date DATE,
    revision_date DATE,
    regulation_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE inspections (
    inspection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    inspector_name VARCHAR(255),
    inspection_date DATE,
    company_id INT,
    compliance_status VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES companies(company_id)
)
